012_client_stream_incurred_overage.name: client_stream_incurred_overage
012_client_stream_incurred_overage.description: Activity data triggered when a customer incurs overage

columns.id: The primary key for this table
columns.entity_id: The entity id of the customer
columns.revenue_impact: The revenue impact of the activity
columns.feature_json: JSON string containing feature data related to the activity, including customer segments such as 'active_users', 'churn_risk_users', 'churned_users', 'free_users', 'paid_users', 'grace_period_users', 'canceled_users', 'new_users', 'returning_users', 'trial_users', plan types like 'basic_plan', 'standard_plan', 'premium_plan', 'monthly_plan', 'annual_plan', 'lifetime_plan', and services like 'service1', 'service2', 'service3'.
